data.text: @The_NiravPatel Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Any item in the hand baggage is subject to airport security clearance (CSF). Please click on the link to check the https://t.co/PaOHbVVe5R dangerous goods policy. Thank you. ~Diyashi

data.text: @darshana_gade Ma'am, we confirm that the information you have provided does not belong to IndiGo. It appears that certain people are fraudulently trying to collect money from you on the basis of a fake job offer. We request you to not go forward with any payment. <1/2>

@nehulagarwal Mr Agarwal, we request you to complete web check-in using our mobile application. In case the error persists, please write to us again. ~Yashica

urls.title: Traveling with an Infant in Flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Are you flying with a baby? We offer all the support and comfort in case of infant travel in flight. Read the complete information at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @friendlyshubh Hi, you can certainly travel with the little one. For more information, you may visit https://t.co/lAdlGihXgC. For immediate assistance, feel free to reach out to our crew onboard, they'll be happy to help. Looking forward to flying with you soon. ~Navi

data.text: @ravikhurana2003 Mr Khurana, you can carry your electric kettle and bread toaster with you in check-in luggage only. For more details on content carriage/ restriction, please visit https://t.co/fJVKU8uBmd link. ~Yashica
@karan1anand You're most welcome. 😊 ~Navi

@aamyrk Sir, we are elated to know this and hope that your daughter is doing fine now. We request you to DM us your PNR so we may have your kind words shared with Sapna. Looking forward to having you onboard soon again. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@IN_abhijeet08 Sir, you may get in touch with the airport staff regarding your connecting flight as soon as you reach Pune, our team will assist you. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Baggage Allowance, IndiGo Baggage Allowance | IndiGo
urls.description: Get the detailed information on Indigo baggage allowance for your all domestic flights as well as international flights. Know the number and weight of baggage prices you are allowed to carry during your journey.

data.text: @Arvind_National Hi, please visit https://t.co/qHYQwbcAmg to get detailed info on the same. Thanks.~Vaishali
@TaniViya Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you at the earliest.~Vaishali
@VimishaG Sir, we sincerely regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will get back to you.~Vaishali
@amit_rocker Hi, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali

@adhurapan We are sorry for such an unpleasant experience. We have been taking all the necessary steps to control mosquitoes and only allow passengers to board once the fumigation is done. Rest, stay assured, we'll have your feedback shared with our concerned team. ~Navi
@IndiGo6E In case you face any issue, please let us know about the same via DM so we may check and assist you. Thanks. (2/2) ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@quizwithmanas Mr Nayak, in case you don't wish to pay for the seats, you may always do 'Auto Assign Check-In' and the Boarding Pass will be sent to you with auto-assigned seat number, 12-6 hours prior of the flight departure time. (1/2)
@Discourse_69ing We regret the delay in response. As checked, seats are already assigned. Hope to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali
@imrahul_2018 Mr Shah, we regret the experience and will have your feedback shared with our concerned Airport Team. Wishing you a comfortable time onboard our flight. ~Navi
@Jayu4456 We regret the delay in response. As we are receiving a high volume of mentions we could not cater to your query on time. Hope to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali
@Aditya63321930 Sir, please be informed that the shuttle service is free. Also, it is the passenger's whole sole responsibility to reach the terminal. We hope for your understanding.~Vaishali
@ShwetaDawkar Ms Dawkar, we tried calling you multiple times, however, couldn't connect. Please share an alternate number so we may speak with you in this regard. Thanks.~Vaishali
@SubrataDas12 Sir, we believe your bag has been united with you by now. Further, we wish to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @AMITKUM00667868 Sir, we regret the inconvenience and have added all the seats in 28th Row. Please visit https://t.co/6AeiBVBxXb to check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@ginaghosh Ms Ghosh, thank you for taking the time to speak with us. We hope this has been addressed. We regret falling short of expectations and hope to serve you better in the future. ~Ojasvi

@karan1anand Mr Anand, if both the connecting flights are in same PNR, in that case, the checked-in luggage will be auto-transferred to the next flight and the customers will receive the luggage at their final destination. We hope this clarifies. ~Navi

urls.title: FAQs about Baggage Allowance & General Advisories - IndiGo
urls.description: Read the frequently asked questions about baggage allowance for domestic & international flights. Know more on baggage weight, allowed & not allowed items, etc.

data.text: @pravin4285 Mr Gokhe, customers are allowed to carry upto 5 litres of Alcohol in their Check-In Baggage. Please visit 'Carriage of Alcoholic Beverages' at https://t.co/tDEfGzJ0JE for more information on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

@jhurani_preeti Ms Jhurani, we regret the experience and are checking on this. Please allow us some time and we'll get back to you ASAP. You may also DM us for further communication on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@SouryaRDas1 Mr Das, CUTE stands for ' Common User Terminal Equipment ' charge. It is the amount that is charged for the use of metal detecting machines, escalators, and other equipment used at airports. It is also referred to as a " Passenger Handling Fee, " ~Navi

urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @shenoym Mr Shenoy, we regret the inconvenience caused. As checked, above mentioned PNRs are cancelled with Full Refund and you may contact your concerned Travel Agency after 48 hrs to claim the refund. You may also check the refund status at https://t.co/UHMZsLjJKS. Thanks. ~Navi
@Discourse_69ing Sir, we request you to share the PNR via DM so we may assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@shilpaanand @MoCA_GoI Ms Anand, we never intend for any of our customers to go through discomfort at any point of their trip. We would like to speak with you to discuss this further. Could you please DM us your PNR, contact number, and a convenient time to connect? ~Kritika
